content: granny smith wrap by maanel yarn old maiden aunt alpaca/silk/cashmere laceweight 1 skein = 1300 0 yards 1188 7m colorway ghillie dhu rowan kidsilk haze 4 skeins = 916 0 yards 837 6m colorway jelly 597 needles 5 mm / us 8 size 70 x 168 cm / 27 6 x 66 inches abbreviations k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 sts together skp slip one knit one pass slip st over yo yarnover instructions knit always with the two yarns together cast on 106 sts with 5mm needles /us 8 knit 6 row in garter stitch free pattern copyright 2012 start lace pattern row 1 rs k10 k2tog yo *k10 k2tog yo** repeat * - ** knit last 10 sts row 2 ws k5 p96 k5 row 3 rs k10 yo skp *k10 yo skp** repeat * - ** knit last 10 sts row 4 ws as row 2 repeat these 4 row till desired length end with 6 row in garter stitch cast off weave in all ends and block free pattern copyright 2012
